name: Space Junkies™
description: Space Junkies™ is a visceral, jetpack-fueled VR Arcade Shooter where you fly through deadly Orbital Arenas in hostile space, facing off in extreme battles!
minimum_requirements: Processor: I5-4590 or Ryzen5 1500X - 3.5 Ghz Graphics: GTX 970 – 4 GB or RX 480X - 8GB Storage: 5 GB available space
